ygData.subject: RE: Race War
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to clarify.  Say erudite, barbarian and human is one team, and shorties another.  Normally either team is neutral in each other cities. With the race war,
ygData.messageBody:
Just to clarify. Say erudite, barbarian and human is one team, and
shorties another. Normally either team is neutral in each other cities.
With the race war, will shorties kena KOS in human towns by NPCs (not
players), say guards?

I agreed tat evil races somehow shine out in race war, PROVIDED different
teams kena npc KOS in opposite team regions. If npc only KOS for evil
race, then they still got additional disadvantage as compared to other
teams like normal servers.

If it's a FFA kinda server, I think most pple will become evil races and
the whole server will turn to a dark races server, LOL.

Ziltus


On Wednesday, 21 July, 1999 7:08 PM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
wrote:

in

> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 2:49 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Mana calculation
>
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >There is a mana calculation s/w in EQSS, pretty useful. Thou' it's a
very
> >small file but it's not my habit to send attached files over mailing
list
> >(scare kena whacked). Those who are interested can d/l them.
> >
> >Btw now I really regret allocating 20 points on my STR, and the
remaining
> >on STA and INT, sigh.
> >If I have an opportunity restart a char, I will still play a wiz, but
for
> >race, I will either choose:
> >1. Human
> >Dump max point into INT, the rest to DEX. Since all other stats are
quite
> >balance, I will buy all INT jewelries to boost my INT further. With no
xp
> >penalty, shld be able to lvl quite fast. The night vision problem can
be
> >solved using lightglobe (lvl 1 spell) or light bank (lvl 16 spell).
> >OR
> >2. Erudite
> >Dump max point into INT, the rest to DEX. Thou' got more INT, but also
got
> >10% xp penalty, kinda offset as compared to human. Night vision thingy
> >applies. This race is the best option for ultimate killer-nuker at lvl
50,
> >hehe.
> >
> >Of coz, if I dun mind the look and short sight, I can select gnome for
> >power play - best choice for solo caster in my opinion, due to the high
> >INT, DEX and AGI.
> >
> >Dark Elf is out of question since i dun really like to role-play as an
evil
> >race, where in RL or in game, unless the power-play capability is worth
> >been a evil char ;)
> >
> >Oh, anyone ever think of playing in the race war server? Heheh OK OK,
dun
> >throw parang first lah. I'm only asking, hehe. Read quite a few
articles
> >in the net on the coming race war server (eg analysing which group is
more
> >or less powerful), sound pretty fun and have lot of role-play elements.
> > One thing for sure, it's gonna be a VERY difficult server to survive
> >(since u will be KOS in many places), hehe.
> >
> >Ziltus
